mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.doc_id AS "doc_id", a.gndyjzmj AS "gndyjzmj", a.mzxyfyjkyf AS "mzxyfyjkyf", if(a.mzxyfyjkyf='1','是','否') "mzxyfyjkyfName", a.mzzyfyjkyf AS "mzzyfyjkyf", a.jzyfyjkyf AS "jzyfyjkyf", a.tsyfyjkyf AS "tsyfyjkyf", a.jyfyjkyf AS "jyfyjkyf", a.ypkyjkyf AS "ypkyjkyf", a.cxsjykyf AS "cxsjykyf", a.hysjykyf AS "hysjykyf", a.xgjspsfskyf AS "xgjspsfskyf", a.xgjkzsfskyf AS "xgjkzsfskyf", a.ctspsfskyf AS "ctspsfskyf", a.ctkzsfskyf AS "ctkzsfskyf", a.dpsfskyf AS "dpsfskyf", a.xdts AS "xdts", a.css AS "css", a.xksxkyf AS "xksxkyf", a.pxssxkyf AS "pxssxkyf", a.qwqxdgys AS "qwqxdgys", a.jcbzjmjqxdgys AS "jcbzjmjqxdgys", a.wjwpcfqxdgys AS "wjwpcfqxdgys", a.sssssb AS "sssssb", a.cfssb AS "cfssb", a.zbsssb AS "zbsssb", a.dcsssb AS "dcsssb", a.gysssb AS "gysssb", a.xsjssb AS "xsjssb", a.shsxsssb AS "shsxsssb", a.qtqzm AS "qtqzm"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ironfo_five_yjyf( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, doc_id, gndyjzmj, mzxyfyjkyf, mzzyfyjkyf, jzyfyjkyf, tsyfyjkyf, jyfyjkyf, ypkyjkyf, cxsjykyf, hysjykyf, xgjspsfskyf, xgjkzsfskyf, ctspsfskyf, ctkzsfskyf, dpsfskyf, xdts, css, xksxkyf, pxssxkyf, qwqxdgys, jcbzjmjqxdgys, wjwpcfqxdgys, sssssb, cfssb, zbsssb, dcsssb, gysssb, xsjssb, shsxsssb, qtqzm ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{doc_id}, #{gndyjzmj}, #{mzxyfyjkyf}, #{mzzyfyjkyf}, #{jzyfyjkyf}, #{tsyfyjkyf}, #{jyfyjkyf}, #{ypkyjkyf}, #{cxsjykyf}, #{hysjykyf}, #{xgjspsfskyf}, #{xgjkzsfskyf}, #{ctspsfskyf}, #{ctkzsfskyf}, #{dpsfskyf}, #{xdts}, #{css}, #{xksxkyf}, #{pxssxkyf}, #{qwqxdgys}, #{jcbzjmjqxdgys}, #{wjwpcfqxdgys}, #{sssssb}, #{cfssb}, #{zbsssb}, #{dcsssb}, #{gysssb}, #{xsjssb}, #{shsxsssb}, #{qtqzm} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ironfo_five_yjyf SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, doc_id = #{doc_id}, gndyjzmj = #{gndyjzmj}, mzxyfyjkyf = #{mzxyfyjkyf}, mzzyfyjkyf = #{mzzyfyjkyf}, jzyfyjkyf = #{jzyfyjkyf}, tsyfyjkyf = #{tsyfyjkyf}, jyfyjkyf = #{jyfyjkyf}, ypkyjkyf = #{ypkyjkyf}, cxsjykyf = #{cxsjykyf}, hysjykyf = #{hysjykyf}, xgjspsfskyf = #{xgjspsfskyf}, xgjkzsfskyf = #{xgjkzsfskyf}, ctspsfskyf = #{ctspsfskyf}, ctkzsfskyf = #{ctkzsfskyf}, dpsfskyf = #{dpsfskyf}, xdts = #{xdts}, css = #{css}, xksxkyf = #{xksxkyf}, pxssxkyf = #{pxssxkyf}, qwqxdgys = #{qwqxdgys}, jcbzjmjqxdgys = #{jcbzjmjqxdgys}, wjwpcfqxdgys = #{wjwpcfqxdgys}, sssssb = #{sssssb}, cfssb = #{cfssb}, zbsssb = #{zbsssb}, dcsssb = #{dcsssb}, gysssb = #{gysssb}, xsjssb = #{xsjssb}, shsxsssb = #{shsxsssb}, qtqzm = #{qtqzm} WHERE id = #{id}
